dimensions: Warp x Weft (selvedge to selvedge): 87 x 65.5 cm (34 1/4 x 25 13/16 in.)
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton, metallic yarns
Technique: supplementary warp pile (velvet): two sets of supplementary warps (red and blue) with cut loops in a five-harness satin foundation (white) with discontinuous supplementary wefts (gold) bound on the front in 1/4 twill
description: Rows of offset circles in off-white satin on a deep red velvet pile ground. Each circle contains a medallion near its base, encircled by flowering hyacinth branches. Each medallion contains a pearl near its base, encircled by  a carnation and tulip on a vine. Above each medallion and above and below each circle are trefoil patterns.  A border at the bottom shows carnations enclosed in shield-shaped tabs. Two pieces sewn together.
name: Textile
